name: Extinction Event (Heavens)
description:
This is my take on a game called Mission Omega, which I used to play on the C64.

Tech balance wasn't tested much

The robots can get confused and spin the wrong way when turning, it will sort itself out if the controls are left alone

Only limited sound effects

Big map view disabled, not enough time to finish it.

Credits:

Hub Tune: https://opengameart.org/content/data-corruption

Art: CraftPix.net

Music: SoundImage.org

This was created the Jam for All BASIC Dialects (#4) https://itch.io/jam/jam-for-all-basic-dialects-4
